devdoc.author: Saving Banking Team
devdoc.details: Implements role-based access control, pausability, and reentrancy protection  Features: - Create and manage saving plans with configurable interest rates and terms - Allow users to open fixed-term deposits and earn interest - Support early withdrawal with configurable penalties - Enable deposit renewal with compound interest (principal + interest) - Mint NFT certificates for each deposit as proof of ownership  Security: - Uses OpenZeppelin's AccessControl for role management - Implements ReentrancyGuard on all state-changing functions - Supports emergency pause functionality - Separates liquidity management via external Vault contract

AccessControlBadConfirmation().details: The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.details: Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this.

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}.

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

activateSavingPlan(uint256).details: Convenience function equivalent to updateSavingPlanStatus(planId, true)

params.planId: The ID of the saving plan to activate

returns.penaltyAmount: The penalty amount if withdrawn early (0 if already mature)

calculateExpectedInterest(uint256,uint25.details: Uses simple interest formula: (principal * rate * time) / (10000 * 365)

params.planId: The saving plan ID to use for interest rate

constructor.details: Grants DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE and ADMIN_ROLE to the deployer

params.certificateAddress: Address of the DepositCertificate NFT contract
params.tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token for deposits (e.g., USDC)
params.vaultAddress: Address of the Vault contract for liquidity management

createDeposit(uint256,uint256,uint32).details: Mints an NFT certificate as proof of deposit ownership

params.amount: The deposit amount (must be within plan's min/max limits)
params.savingPlanId: The ID of the saving plan to use
params.termInDays: The deposit term in days (must be within plan's term limits)

returns.depositId: The unique ID of the created deposit  Requirements: - Contract must not be paused - Saving plan must exist and be active - Amount must be within plan's deposit limits - Term must be within plan's term limits - Caller must have approved this contract to spend tokens  Effects: - Transfers tokens from caller to vault - Mints NFT certificate to caller - Records deposit details - Emits DepositCreated event

createSavingPlan((string,uint256,uint256.details: Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. Emits SavingPlanCreated event on success.

params.input: The saving plan configuration parameters  Requirements: - minTermInDays must be greater than 0 - maxTermInDays must be greater than minTermInDays - annualInterestRateInBasisPoints must be greater than 0 - penaltyRateInBasisPoints must not exceed 10000 (100%)

params.planId: The ID of the saving plan to deactivate

depositToVault(uint256).details: Transfers tokens from admin to this contract, then to vault

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit (must be pre-approved)  Requirements: - amount must be greater than 0 - Caller must have approved this contract to spend tokens

getActiveDepositCount().details: Iterates through all deposits - may be gas expensive for large datasets

returns.count: The number of deposits with Active status

returns._0: The Deposit struct containing all deposit details

params.planId: The ID of the saving plan

returns._0: The address that receives early withdrawal penalties (zero address if not set)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params.planId: The ID of the saving plan

returns._0: The SavingPlan struct containing all plan details
The count of all deposits (including closed/renewed ones)
The count of all saving plans (including inactive ones)
Array of deposit IDs owned by the user

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.depositId: The ID of the deposit to check

returns._0: True if the deposit is mature (current time >= maturity date)

pause().details: Only callable by PAUSER_ROLE. Admin functions remain available.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renewDeposit(uint256,uint256,uint32).details: Creates a new deposit with principal = old principal + earned interest

params.depositId: The ID of the deposit to renew
params.newPlanId: The saving plan ID for the new deposit (can be same or different)
params.newTermInDays: The term for the new deposit

returns.newDepositId: The ID of the newly created deposit  Compound Interest: - New principal = old principal + old expected interest - New interest calculated based on new principal and new plan rate  Requirements: - Contract must not be paused - Caller must be the deposit owner - Original deposit must be matured (current time >= maturity date) - Original deposit must be in Active status - New plan must exist and be active - New principal must meet new plan's deposit limits - New term must be within new plan's term limits  Effects: - Updates old deposit status to Renewed - Creates new deposit with compounded principal - Mints new NFT certificate - Emits DepositRenewed and DepositCreated events

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

updatePenaltyReceiver(uint256,address).details: If not set (zero address), penalties remain in the vault

params.newReceiver: The address to receive penalty amounts
params.planId: The ID of the saving plan

updateSavingPlan(uint256,(string,uint256.details: Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. Does not affect existing deposits.

params.input: The new saving plan configuration parameters  Requirements: - Plan must exist - Same validation rules as createSavingPlan
params.planId: The ID of the saving plan to update

updateSavingPlanStatus(uint256,bool).details: Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. Inactive plans cannot accept new deposits.

params.isEnabled: True to activate, false to deactivate the plan
params.planId: The ID of the saving plan to update

withdrawDeposit(uint256).details: Only the current NFT certificate owner can withdraw the deposit

params.depositId: The ID of the deposit to withdraw  Withdrawal Types: - At Maturity: NFT owner receives principal + full interest - Early Withdrawal: NFT owner receives principal - penalty (no interest)  Penalty Handling: - If penaltyReceiver is set: penalty sent to receiver - If penaltyReceiver is zero: penalty remains in vault  Requirements: - Contract must not be paused - Caller must be the current NFT certificate owner - Deposit must be in Active status - Vault must have sufficient liquidity  Effects: - Updates deposit status to Withdrawn - Transfers appropriate amount to user - Emits DepositWithdrawn event

withdrawFromVault(uint256).details: Used for emergency or excess liquidity removal

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw  Requirements: - amount must be greater than 0 - Vault must have sufficient liquidity

_nextDepositId.details: Counter for generating unique deposit IDs (starts at 1)

_nextPlanId.details: Counter for generating unique plan IDs (starts at 1)

deposits.details: Mapping from deposit ID to Deposit struct

planPenaltyReceivers.details: Mapping from plan ID to penalty receiver address

savingPlans.details: Mapping from plan ID to SavingPlan struct

userDepositIds.details: Mapping from user address to array of their deposit IDs

devdoc.title: SavingBank

ADMIN_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for administrative operations (plan management, vault operations)

PAUSER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for emergency pause/unpause operations

activateSavingPlan(uint256).notice: Activates a saving plan to accept new deposits

calculateEarlyWithdrawalPenalty(uint256).notice: Calculates the penalty amount for early withdrawal of a specific deposit

calculateExpectedInterest(uint256,uint25.notice: Calculates the expected interest for a hypothetical deposit

constructor.notice: Initializes the SavingBank contract with required dependencies

createDeposit(uint256,uint256,uint32).notice: Creates a new fixed-term deposit for the caller

createSavingPlan((string,uint256,uint256.notice: Creates a new saving plan with specified parameters

deactivateSavingPlan(uint256).notice: Deactivates a saving plan to prevent new deposits

depositCertificate().notice: The ERC721 contract for minting deposit certificates

depositToVault(uint256).notice: Deposits tokens into the vault for interest payments

depositToken().notice: The ERC20 token used for deposits (e.g., USDC)

getActiveDepositCount().notice: Counts the number of currently active deposits

getDeposit(uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a deposit

getDepositCertificateAddress().notice: Returns the address of the deposit certificate NFT contract

getDepositToken().notice: Returns the address of the deposit token (e.g., USDC)

getPenaltyReceiver(uint256).notice: Returns the penalty receiver address for a specific plan

getSavingPlan(uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a saving plan

getTotalDeposits().notice: Returns the total number of deposits ever created

getTotalPlans().notice: Returns the total number of saving plans created

getUserDepositIds(address).notice: Retrieves all deposit IDs for a specific user

getVaultAddress().notice: Returns the address of the vault contract

getVaultBalance().notice: Returns the current balance of the vault

isDepositMature(uint256).notice: Checks if a deposit has reached its maturity date

pause().notice: Pauses all user operations (deposits, withdrawals, renewals)

renewDeposit(uint256,uint256,uint32).notice: Renews a matured deposit with compound interest

unpause().notice: Resumes all user operations after a pause

updatePenaltyReceiver(uint256,address).notice: Sets the address that receives early withdrawal penalties for a plan

updateSavingPlan(uint256,(string,uint256.notice: Updates an existing saving plan's parameters

updateSavingPlanStatus(uint256,bool).notice: Updates the active status of a saving plan

vault().notice: The vault contract managing liquidity for interest payments

withdrawDeposit(uint256).notice: Withdraws a deposit (at maturity or early with penalty)

withdrawFromVault(uint256).notice: Withdraws tokens from the vault to admin

userdoc.notice: Core contract for on-chain savings bank operations with fixed-term deposits
